metadata.dc:author: Martínez-Alcalá, F
Lazo Ramos, A
Sabaté Díaz, J J
Leal Tortolero, M
metadata.dc:description: We did a retrospective study of 100 patients who underwent endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography (ERCP), selecting those cases in which the final diagnosis was pancreatitis or pancreatic neoplasm. We analyzed the pancreatic radiographs obtained using this technique and describe the most characteristic diagnostic findings in each case. Results are compared to those published in the medical literature.
metadata.dc:title: Pancreatitis crónica o cáncer? Semiología pancreatográfica.
[Chronic pancreatitis or cancer? Semeiology of pancreatic radiography].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de las enfermedades del aparato digestivo
